data.lyric:
[ti:Shape of You]
[ar:Ed Sheeran]
[al:Shape of You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Shape of You - Ed Sheeran (艾德·希兰)
[00:02.38]Lyrics by：Ed Sheeran/Steve Mac/Johnny McDaid
[00:04.77]Composed by：Ed Sheeran/Steve Mac/Johnny McDaid
[00:07.16]Produced by：Steve Mac
[00:09.55]The club isn't the best place to find a lover
[00:11.99]So the bar is where I go
[00:13.98]
[00:15.00]Me and my friends at the table doing shots
[00:17.10]Drinking fast and then we talk slow
[00:18.62]
[00:19.79]You come over and start up a conversation with just me
[00:22.31]And trust me I'll give it a chance now
[00:24.53]Take my hand stop put Van the Man on the jukebox
[00:27.35]And then we start to dance and now I'm singing like
[00:29.87]Girl you know I want your love
[00:32.47]Your love was handmade for somebody like me
[00:35.57]Come on now follow my lead
[00:36.83]
[00:37.44]I may be crazy don't mind me
[00:39.63]Say boy let's not talk too much
[00:42.51]Grab on my waist and put that body on me
[00:45.48]Come on now follow my lead
[00:47.16]Come come on now follow my lead
[00:49.10]
[00:50.84]I'm in love with the shape of you
[00:52.68]
[00:53.34]We push and pull like a magnet do
[00:55.06]
[00:55.90]Although my heart is falling too
[00:57.58]
[00:58.26]I'm in love with your body
[00:59.98]
[01:00.86]Last night you were in my room
[01:02.69]
[01:03.30]And now my bed sheets smell like you
[01:05.31]Every day discovering something brand new
[01:07.65]
[01:08.33]I'm in love with your body
[01:09.99]Oh I oh I oh I oh I
[01:12.36]
[01:13.35]I'm in love with your body
[01:14.90]Oh I oh I oh I oh I
[01:17.28]
[01:18.36]I'm in love with your body
[01:20.02]Oh I oh I oh I oh I
[01:22.33]
[01:23.33]I'm in love with your body
[01:24.48]
[01:25.37]Every day discovering something brand new
[01:27.60]
[01:28.39]I'm in love with the shape of you
[01:29.97]One week in we let the story begin
[01:31.96]We're going out on our first date
[01:33.82]
[01:34.70]You and me are thrifty so go all you can eat
[01:36.98]Fill up your bag and I fill up a plate
[01:38.70]
[01:39.51]We talk for hours and hours about the sweet and the sour
[01:41.99]And how your family is doing okay
[01:43.57]
[01:44.55]Leave and get in a taxi then kiss in the backseat
[01:46.94]Tell the driver make the radio play and I'm singing like
[01:50.07]Girl you know I want your love
[01:52.47]Your love was handmade for somebody like me
[01:55.46]Come on now follow my lead
[01:56.87]
[01:57.45]I may be crazy don't mind me
[01:59.66]Say boy let's not talk too much
[02:02.56]Grab on my waist and put that body on me

data.trans:
[ti:Shape of You]
[ar:Ed Sheeran]
[al:Shape of You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.38]//
[00:04.77]//
[00:07.16]//
[00:09.55]俱乐部不是找另一半的绝佳场所
[00:11.99]所以酒吧很适合我
[00:13.98]
[00:15.00]我和朋友们百无聊赖的喝着酒
[00:17.10]我们喝的很急 却漫不经心的聊着
[00:18.62]
[00:19.79]你向我走来 开始跟我搭讪
[00:22.31]相信我 我会给你机会的
[00:24.53]牵起我的手 我们点首Van The Man（爱尔兰歌手）的歌吧
[00:27.35]然后我们就可以翩然起舞了 此刻我的歌声像是
[00:29.87]女孩 你知道我渴望你的爱
[00:32.47]你的爱为我量身打造 专属于我
[00:35.57]来吧 听我指挥吧
[00:36.83]
[00:37.44]或许我有点疯狂 请不要介意
[00:39.63]说小子 不必多说废话
[00:42.51]将你的手搭上我的腰 贴近我吧
[00:45.48]来吧 听我指挥吧
[00:47.16]来吧 来吧 听我指挥吧
[00:49.10]
[00:50.84]我爱上了你妙曼的姿态
[00:52.68]
[00:53.34]缠绵之间 我们像是磁铁般相互吸引
[00:55.06]
[00:55.90]尽管我的心早已为你沦陷
[00:57.58]
[00:58.26]你的身体让我无比眷恋
[00:59.98]
[01:00.86]昨晚你在我房间过夜
[01:02.69]
[01:03.30]今晨床单上你的香气流连
[01:05.31]每一天似乎焕然一新
[01:07.65]
[01:08.33]你的身体让我无比眷恋
[01:09.99]噢 我无法自拔沦陷
[01:12.36]
[01:13.35]你的身体让我无比眷恋
[01:14.90]噢 我无法自拔沦陷
[01:17.28]

[01:20.02]噢 我无法自拔沦陷
[01:22.33]
[01:23.33]你的身体让我无比眷恋
[01:24.48]
[01:25.37]每一天似乎焕然一新
[01:27.60]
[01:28.39]我爱上了你妙曼的姿态
[01:29.97]一周时间 就让这爱情故事上演吧
[01:31.96]我们可以开始属于我们的初次约会
[01:33.82]
[01:34.70]我们都很节俭 那就随你喜欢尽情挥霍一次
[01:36.98]包包里塞满吃的 我可以装满餐盘
[01:38.70]
[01:39.51]这酸或甜足以让我们聊上几个小时
[01:41.99]你的家人还好吗
[01:43.57]
[01:44.55]坐上的士离开 我们在后座上热吻
[01:46.94]让司机打开收音机 我的歌声像是 
[01:50.07]女孩 你知道我渴望你的爱
[01:52.47]你的爱为我量身打造 专属于我
[01:55.46]来吧 听我指挥吧
[01:56.87]
[01:57.45]或许我有点疯狂 请不要介意
[01:59.66]说小子 不必多说废话
[02:02.56]将你的手搭上我的腰 贴近我吧
[02:05.52]来吧 听我指挥吧
[02:07.21]来吧 来吧 听我指挥吧
[02:09.06]
[02:10.82]我爱上了你妙曼的姿态
[02:12.58]
